name: Witchfire Academy
description:
W A S D to move,

Mouse to pan around,

Mouse Left/Right click to fire the Right/Left wands,

Just walk to the glowing exit to to move onto level 2 and finish the game after level 2.

Ran into some nasty bugs that took way too long and was unable to implement all the enemies, weapons and player upgrades :/

Thanks for giving it a try.

Fire spells can burn while Ice spells can freeze for .3 sec.
